statements: SELECT * FROM MonthlyFinancialReports;
SELECT report_id, month, year FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT total_revenue, total_expenses, net_income FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE month = 'January';
SELECT * FROM MonthlyFinancialReports ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC;
SELECT report_id, total_revenue, net_income FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE total_revenue > 10000;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 'January';
SELECT report_id, month, total_revenue FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT month, total_expenses FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE net_income < 0 ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE year = 2020 OR year = 2022 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, total_expenses ASC;
SELECT report_id, net_income FROM MonthlyFinancialReports WHERE total_revenue - total_expenses > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_income FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_expenses FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM expense_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, category_description FROM expense_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE total_income > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, total_income FROM financial_reports WHERE total_expenses < 5000 ORDER BY total_income DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_expenses ASC
SELECT report_name, total_income, total_expenses FROM financial_reports JOIN expense_categories ON financial_reports.report_id = expense_categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Marketing'
SELECT report_name, total_income, total_expenses FROM financial_reports WHERE total_income - total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY total_income - total_expenses DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT month, year, total_revenue FROM financial_reports;
SELECT category, amount FROM revenue_details ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM expense_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT report_id, month FROM financial_reports WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE year = 2021
SELECT month, total_revenue FROM financial_reports WHERE total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT report_id, month, year, total_revenue + total_expenses AS net_profit FROM financial_reports WHERE total_revenue > total_expenses
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM revenue_details GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM expense_details WHERE amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM expense_details)
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT account_id, received_amount FROM transactions WHERE received_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT account_id, type FROM accounts WHERE type IN ('Savings', 'Checking');
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT account_name, user_id, transaction_date FROM accounts JOIN users ON accounts.user_id = users.user_id WHERE user_type = 'admin' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'savings') ORDER BY transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_id, total_income FROM MonthlyReports WHERE total_income > 10000
SELECT employee_name, department FROM EmployeeSalaries WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM ExpenseDetails WHERE category = 'Utilities'
SELECT department_name, total_budget FROM DepartmentBudget ORDER BY total_budget DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM MonthlyReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, total_income ASC
SELECT report_date, total_expenses FROM MonthlyReports WHERE total_expenses > 5000
SELECT department_name, total_budget FROM DepartmentBudget WHERE total_budget < 100000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC
SELECT employee_name, salary, department FROM EmployeeSalaries WHERE salary > 70000
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_income FROM IncomeDetails GROUP BY category HAVING total_income > 500
